title: How to Make Anima in Kashmiri Style

steps.headline: Clean them properly by removing husk or small pebbles or other grains.
Place them in a utensil and wash it thoroughly under running water.
Place it on a gas stove and switch on the flame.
Keep mixing the rice and water in order to avoid the lump formation.If there are any lumps present, mash them with the help of a spoon.
Keep checking whether the rice grains are boiled or not.
steps.description: This might be done by taking out few grains and break the grain into two with the finger nails. If the grain splits into two, then the grains are cooked. If not, then allow them to boil for some time more.

steps.headline: Take a lid and cover the utensil.
Take a cloth piece and place it parallel to the lid.
Remove the extra rice starch water from the utensil into another bowl.

text: Take rice in a bowl.  Clean them properly by removing husk or small pebbles or other grains.  Place them in a utensil and wash it thoroughly under running water.  Add clean drinking water.  Place it on a gas stove and switch on the flame.  Keep mixing the rice and water in order to avoid the lump formation.If there are any lumps present, mash them with the help of a spoon.  Keep checking whether the rice grains are boiled or not. This might be done by taking out few grains and break the grain into two with the finger nails. If the grain splits into two, then the grains are cooked. If not, then allow them to boil for some time more. Take a lid and cover the utensil.  Take a cloth piece and place it parallel to the lid.  Remove the extra rice starch water from the utensil into another bowl.  This is Anima water.
